items.name: Ext_Int_ID
items.label: داخلي / خارجي
items.sql:
SELECT Ext_Int_ID 
FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: First_Name

FROM PMT_TB110005
WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

WHERE ID = '@#ID_Detector'

items.name: Ext_Jobs_Finder
items.label: نمايش سمت براي فرد خارج سازمان

columns.name: Ext_ORG_Job_Title_Show
columns.label: عنوان شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT ORG_Job_Title 
FROM PMT_TB120014
WHERE IsActive = 1 
 and Ext_Int_ID = '@#Ext_Int_ID_Finder' 
 and System_Personal_Code = '@#Ext_System_Personal_Code_Finder'
 and ORG_Job_Code_Rank = '@#Ext_ORG_Job_Code_Rank_Finder'
columns.title: عنوان شغل

items.title: نمايش سمت براي فرد خارج سازمان

items.name: Ext_Jobs
items.label: تعيين سمت براي فرد خارج سازمان

columns.name: Ext_Job_ID
columns.label: انتخاب شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, 'كد تركيبي را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT ID, CONCAT (ORG_Job_Code," || ",ORG_Job_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110007
WHERE ORG_Job_Title LIKE "%@#Ext_Job_Search%" and IsActive = 1 and Ext_Int_ID = 'X'
columns.title: انتخاب شغل

columns.name: Ext_ORG_Job_Code
columns.label: كد شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT ORG_Job_Code
FROM PMT_TB110007
WHERE ID = "@#Ext_Job_ID"
columns.title: كد شغل

columns.name: Ext_ORG_Job_Title
columns.label: عنوان شغل
columns.sql:
SELECT ORG_Job_Title
FROM PMT_TB110007
WHERE ID = "@#Ext_Job_ID"
columns.title: عنوان شغل

items.title: تعيين سمت براي فرد خارج سازمان
